sen.j: 地方巧者（じかたこうしゃ）は、江戸時代に地方支配（じかたしはい）に精通した農政官僚のことである。
sen.e: The jikata kosha is an Edo Period bureaucrat overseeing domain affairs who had extensive knowledge of regional affairs.
Jikata kosha was an Edo Period bureaucrat overseeing domain agriculture who had extensive knowledge of regional affairs.
sen.cmt: 過去化、冠詞削除、スペース削除、「農政」が訳抜けのため補完
sen.e: Jikata kosha was an Edo Period bureaucrat overseeing domain agriculture who had extensive knowledge of regional affairs.

sen.j: 旗本・御家人の官僚化が進んだ享保年間以降は、民間からの登用が目立ち、しかも彼ら地方巧者は地方書の著者でもあったので、地方巧者という呼称が普及した。
sen.e: After the Kyoho period when the hatamoto (bakufu retainers) and gokenin (retainers of the Kamakura bakufu) were organized into the bakufu bureaucracy, jikata kosha posts were granted to ordinary citizens in increasing frequency and became widely recognized, also due to the fact that these appointees authored guides to domain administration.

After the Kyoho era when hatamoto (bakufu retainers) and gokenin (retainers of the Kamakura bakufu) were organized into the bakufu bureaucracy, jikata kosha posts were often granted to ordinary citizens, and due to the fact that these appointees authored guides to domain administration, they were commonly called jikata kosha.
sen.cmt: 用語統一に合わせeraに変更、文の簡略化、「地方巧者という呼称が普及した」が訳抜けのため補完
